name: Bob
reply_text: I recommend Ichiran Ramen in Shibuya - great atmosphere and food!

name: Charlie
reply_text: Try Uobei for amazing sushi. Very affordable too.

name: David
reply_text: Check out the local business support center. They offer free consultations.

reply_text: Kyoto Handicraft Center is perfect for traditional workshops. Highly recommended!
